caption.center: GEORGE E. LEWIS v. LUCIA CHUDY RHODE ISLAND DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS

court.center: State of Rhode Island, Superior Court.

unpublished.footnote_body: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.]

opinion_text.unpublished:
The plaintiff's motion for clarification of the Court's Decision filed on October 17, 1994 is DENIED.
The defendant will enter an Order on notice to the plaintiff.
